CHAPTER 1246 Assurance for Completion and Maintenance of Improvements

1246.01 Improvements and subdivider’s agreement.

1246.02 Inspection of improvements.

1246.03 Release of security.

1246.04 Escrow deposits for lot improvements.

1246.05 Maintenance of improvements.

1246.06 Deferral of required improvements.

1246.07 Issuance of building permits and certificates of occupancy.
